description: Numbers n such that 2^n does not contain the digit 8 (probably finite).
comments: No additional terms up to 50000 [from Harvey P. Dale, Apr 12 2011]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | not 8 in Intseq(2^n) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 06 2015
crossrefs: Cf. similar sequences listed in A035064.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998
extensions: Initial 0 added and Mathematica code adapted by _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 06 2015
